verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they bring <S%H3947><s%> you a red <S%H122><s%> heifer <S%H6510><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot, <S%H8549><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> blemish, <S%H3971><s%> and on which <S%H834><s%> never <S%H3808><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> yoke: <S%H5923><s%>

And you shall give <S%H5414><s%> her to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that he may bring <S%H3318><s%> her forth <S%H3318><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and one shall slay <S%H7819><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> his face:

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of her blood <S%H1818><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> of her blood <S%H1818><s%> directly <S%H413><s%> <S%H5227><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times:

And one shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the heifer <S%H6510><s%> in his sight; <S%H5869><s%> her skin, <S%H5785><s%> and her flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and her blood, <S%H1818><s%> with her dung, <S%H6569><s%> shall he burn: <S%H8313><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> cedar <S%H730><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> it into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%> of the heifer. <S%H6510><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and he shall bathe <S%H7364><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And he that burns <S%H8313><s%> her shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> and bathe <S%H7364><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> and shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And a man <S%H376><s%> that is clean <S%H2889><s%> shall gather <S%H622><s%> up the ashes <S%H665><s%> of the heifer, <S%H6510><s%> and lay <S%H3240><s%> them up without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and it shall be kept <S%H4931><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a water <S%H4325><s%> of separation: <S%H5079><s%> it is a purification <S%H2403><s%> for sin. <S%H2403><s%>

And he that gathers <S%H622><s%> the ashes <S%H665><s%> of the heifer <S%H6510><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> and it shall be to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and to the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojournes <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, for a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
He that touches <S%H5060><s%> the dead <S%H4191><s%> body <S%H5315><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

He shall purify <S%H2398><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> with it on <S%H5921><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall be clean: <S%H2891><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> he purify <S%H2398><s%> not himself the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> then the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall not be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

Whoever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the dead <S%H4191><s%> body <S%H5315><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> that is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and purifies <S%H2398><s%> not himself, defiles <S%H2930><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from Israel: <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of separation <S%H5079><s%> was not sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on him, he shall be unclean; <S%H2931><s%> his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> is yet <S%H5750><s%> on him.

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law, <S%H8451><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> dies <S%H4191><s%> in a tent: <S%H168><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in the tent, <S%H168><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
And every <S%H3605><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has no <S%H369><s%> covering <S%H6781><s%> bound <S%H6616><s%> on it, is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

And whoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> one that is slain <S%H2491><s%> with a sword <S%H2719><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> or a dead <S%H4191><s%> body, <S%H5315><s%> or a bone <S%H6106><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> or a grave, <S%H6913><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And for an unclean <S%H2931><s%> person they shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the ashes <S%H6083><s%> of the burnt <S%H8316><s%> heifer <S%H6510><s%> of purification <S%H2403><s%> for sin, <S%H2403><s%> and running <S%H2416><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> shall be put <S%H5414><s%> thereto <S%H5921><s%> in a vessel: <S%H3627><s%>

And a clean <S%H2889><s%> person <S%H376><s%> <S%H120><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and dip <S%H2881><s%> it in the water, <S%H4325><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it on the tent, <S%H168><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and on the persons <S%H5315><s%> that were there, <S%H8033><s%> and on him that touched <S%H5060><s%> a bone, <S%H6106><s%> or one slain, <S%H2491><s%> or <S%H176><s%> one dead, <S%H4191><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a grave: <S%H6913><s%>

And the clean <S%H2889><s%> person shall sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> on the unclean <S%H2931><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall purify <S%H2398><s%> himself, and wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H7364><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and shall be clean <S%H2891><s%> at even. <S%H6153><s%>

But the man <S%H376><s%> that shall be unclean, <S%H2930><s%> and shall not purify <S%H2398><s%> himself, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from among <S%H8432><s%> the congregation, <S%H6951><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has defiled <S%H2930><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of separation <S%H5079><s%> has not been sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on him; he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

And it shall be a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%> to them, that he that sprinkles <S%H5137><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of separation <S%H5079><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes; <S%H899><s%> and he that touches <S%H5060><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of separation <S%H5079><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> even. <S%H6153><s%>

And whatever <S%H3605><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> person touches <S%H5060><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> that touches <S%H5060><s%> it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> even. <S%H6153><s%>
